item.title: Chicken Gumbo
item.description: This is my standard Gumbo. Alton Brown posted a recipe for inspiration, but I really just do whatever I feel like. I’m not cooking for southerners, so I can deviate from the classics. I’m not about to go hunting for fil√® powder. Ingredient Quantity Red Chili Flakes 2 Teaspoons Onion, Yellow, Chopped 1 Cup Garlic, Clove 6 Peppers, Bell, Medium, Fresh 2 Basil Leaves 5 Flour, Wheat, All Purpose 2 Tablespoons Butter, salted 2 Tablespoons Tomatos, Diced No Salt 4 Cups Celery, Diced 1 Cup Chicken Stock, Organic 2 Cups Okra 4 Cups Make your roux first with the red ingredients.
